ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Soon I will be leaving to a friends house. I m staying there tonight and wont be back till about mid day tomorrow. I hope this one day wont cause problems

OOC: Soon I will be leaving to a friends house. I'm staying there
tonight and wont be back till about mid day tomorrow. I hope this one
day wont cause problems in IGL. If Hot Rod and Epyon are needed for it,
I leave them with Yan. C'ya!

PS: For all of the wrestling fans, I will be seeing InVasion tonight,
and cheering for WCW and ECW!
